FuncDef:
The license trial command controls the control item trial function.
license trial  enable:Enables the control item trial function.
license trial disable:Disables the control item trial function.
y default, the control item trial function are not enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Enables the control item trial function.
-

Disables the control item trial function.
-

Examples: Warning: This operation will enable the license-controlled feature and can be used only after authorization. Please apply for a license before the feature expires. Continue? [Y/N]:y
Info: Operating, please wait for a moment...........done.
Info: Succeeded to perform this operation.
Warning: This operation will disable the license-controlled feature, after which the feature cannot be enabled again. Continue?  [Y/N]:y
Info: Operating, please wait for a moment...........done.
Info: Succeeded to perform this operation.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the trial for control items that support trial, run the license trial enable command. Each R version has two trial use opportunities. After the trial is enabled, the control items run for 90 days at the maximum allowed capabilities. After the trial expires, the feature is disabled. To continue to use the feature, apply for a new formal license file.
